summary: France employs local secret agents in Vietnam 1922 to eliminate resistance. The rebel leader's pretty daughter gets captured. Later an agent seems to have fallen in love with her and helps her escape. He flees, too. Lots of martial arts.
cast: Johnny Nguyen|Veronica Ngo|Dustin Nguyen|Thang Nguyen|Chanh Tin Nguyen|Stephane Gauger|David Minetti|Van Day Nguyen|Tran Trung Linh|Bui Thi Noan|Huu Hau Nguyen|Nguyen Hau|Robeto Abisev|Robert Albisel|Ludovic Fabien Armano|Ursu Razvan Bogdan|Nguyen Quoc Cuong|Jaimie Cuso|Sauriw Frarcoisxauier|Yann Gautier|Do Thu Hang|Gwendhael Le Moine|Vo Thi Le Na|Gwenhael Le Noien|Dmitry Mitschenko|Dnitry Mitschenko|Jean Michel Mondory|Peter Morcom|Doan Nhat Nam|Nguyen Trang Nhung|Lê Quang|Pavel Thachenko|Pavel Tkochenko|Victor Tretyakor|Victor Tretyakov|Vu Van Francisc|Hayder W.|Loai Waarie|Paul Wallis
title: Dòng máu anh hùng
